meanings.definition: Inflammation of the brain, caused by infection or an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent1: Encephalitis can be very dangerous if not treated promptly.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed the patient with encephalitis after observing brain inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The brain threw a party, but encephalitis showed up uninvited and caused chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a storm of confusion, like encephalitis raging in her brain.
meanings.sent5: The image of encephalitis attacking the brain stuck in his mind like a nightmare.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by inflammation of the brain.
meanings.sent1: Severe encephalitis can lead to serious neurological complications.
meanings.sent2: The hospital specializes in treating patients with encephalitis.
meanings.sent3: The brain's protest against encephalitis was both amusing and concerning.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of health, encephalitis was the formidable opponent attacking the brain.
meanings.sent5: The vivid description of encephalitis made the audience shudder in fear.
